trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Vail
There were no other sightings in Vail on or around May 9th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a MUFOM investigator living in Vail and was a my job as a security officer for the Vail Valley Medical Center. I was in a stairwell at the west end of the hospital and there is a window that faces north on the landing between the second and third floors. I was watching the sky for a few minutes as there had been a number of UFO reports in the area when I noticed this white cigar shaped object moving from west to east at about 30 degrees of elevation. UFO was about three quarters of an inch long at arms length and I could not see any wings or tail assembly on the craft. AS it went to the east it entered a small cloud and I felt I should have seen it come out the other side but did not. I did notice an aircraft with a single contrail further to the north and above and behind the UFO that may have been a jet fighter. I guess I had some difficulty realizing what I saw but I did see a similar cigar shaped craft on March 19th, 2004 when I was out in the parking lot at the hospital that traveled the same course. It was during a time when there was a lot of sighting reports out here and I had a sighting the previous day which I reported to MUFON. In both cases the cigar shaped craft reminded me of video shot in Salida in 1995 that was recently shown on one of the UFO Hunters shows.
Summary: Bright white cigar shaped crossed sky to the north of Vail. Entered small cloud and did not come out other side.
